text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength; they will soar on wings like eagles.
Be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power, love, and self-control.
Come to me, all who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart; He will make your paths straight.
God is faithful; He will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear.
Be strong and courageous; do not be afraid, for the LORD is with you.
I know the plans I have for you, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
If God is for us, who can be against us?
All things work together for good to those who love God.
Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you.
Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in Him.
Delight yourself in the LORD, and He will give you the desires of your heart.
Fear not, for I am with you; I will strengthen you and uphold you.
Commit your work to the LORD, and your plans will be established.
His mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning.
God is able to do immeasurably more than all we ask or imagine.
Do not grow weary of doing good; in due season we will reap.
Run with endurance the race set before us, looking to Jesus.
If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously.
Cast all your anxiety on Him, because He cares for you.
My help comes from the LORD, Maker of heaven and earth.
Do not be anxious about anything; pray with thanksgiving, and God’s peace will guard your hearts.
Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men.
Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with your God.
In this world you will have trouble. Take heart; I have overcome the world.
Cast your burden on the LORD, and He will sustain you.
He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
You keep in perfect peace those whose minds are stayed on You.
Be strong and courageous; He will not leave you or forsake you.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good works and glorify your Father.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing.
Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable in Your sight.
He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
I will never leave you nor forsake you.
